subject: Order status
description_text: Can I get a order status on order # SSN1792 thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Nathan Jacobo,  We apologize for what appears to be a logistical holdup on your package, and we will look into this matter for you immediately.

Any update on this?

On Wed, Jul 2, 2025 at 3:02â€¯AM service@simsonn.com
